title: 1957 Ballon d'Or
text: The 1957 Ballon d'Or, given to the best <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player in Europe as judged by a panel of sports journalists from <a href="UEFA">UEFA</a> member countries, was awarded to <a href="Alfredo%20Di%20St%C3%A9fano">Alfredo Di Stéfano</a> on 17 December 1957.
